pros: My experience with Riderflex has been all around positive. Marcy Cartmill has been my contact and she is very positive, very professional, and clearly cares about both the companies she recruits for and the potential employees she contacts. I would recommend Riderflex to any business looking to fill important positions and if you are contacted by Riderflex for a position I would highly recommend taking the call.
I worked with Kelley and Steve and enjoyed the experience. Excellent vetting process, both interaction and knowledge of the role, company and procedures. Highly recommended for executive search

cons: I have nothing negative to say about Riderflex.

advice_to_mgmt: Riderflex assisted me in finding a position. The interview and screening process was extremely thorough and they matched me to a perfect role with a great company. They provided continual, updated and relevant feedback to assist me at every stage, and went above and beyond to offer exemplary service. Riderflex truly exceeded my expectations. Their knowledge and passion is unsurpassed, and it was truly the best experience I have ever encountered from any company.

pros: From the very start, RiderFlex was on top of everything. They were thorough in their explanation of the role they were filling as well as the company and hiring manager. More importantly, they cared about you as a person in the job market.
cons: They put other recruiters to shame, which is obviously a con for everyone else, not RiderFlex.
advice_to_mgmt: Keep it up! Keep up the feedback. Keep up the check ins. Keep up the caring.

review_title: Quality Company with a Quality Mission!
years_at_company: Quality Company with a Quality Mission!
pros:
Supportive company culture & collaborative atmosphere

Remote position

Flexible scheduling

Invests in providing opportunities to employees

Very receptive to feedback from employees, clients, and candidates!
cons: Honestly, it's a bummer some of us live so far apart, these are the kind of people I would love to hang out with even after work!
advice_to_mgmt: Keep up with the quality approach to your work, it continues to put the company a step above the rest!

pros:
Super personable, helpful, and informative.

The entire team went out of their way to help me and even went above and beyond to coach me on some conversation topics and linked in details.
cons: None so far that I can see
advice_to_mgmt: Keep doing what your doing, you have great people

pros: I am not an employee of Riderflex, but have worked with them recently. They have been a pleasure to work with. Responsive, communicative, and thoroughly attentive to all the players in the search process. A true professional approach that we rarely see these days. Thank you to Steve and team!!
cons: No cons that I am able to report.
advice_to_mgmt: Keep the focus on the clients and candidates. It has served you well.

pros:
Every aspect of working with Steve and his team has been wonderful. I have worked with top executive search firms in the past and I have never experienced such a thorough engagement process. The team is thorough from the opportunity overview to the full supporting documentation.

You will be provided details about the position in a way that helps you envision whether or not it’s a true fit, plus you’ll have at your fingertips an understanding of every aspect of the people, the organization, and the product. You typically don’t gather this level of detailed information they provide until you’ve actually been in the position for weeks.

More importantly, I enjoyed each and every interaction with Steve and his team. I am a firm believer that your partners mirror you and your organization's "persona" and approach to doing business. This speaks volumes for those organizations and people that are represented by Riderflex and I am thrilled to be a participant in the network.
cons: I have no complaints for Riderflex.
advice_to_mgmt: Keep up your approach with your clientele!

pros: There's a time when recruiting and candidate vetting reaches a point of maturity and you get beyond the typical questions and answers and the real conversation starts. There's that gray area where you find out who's really listening and the relationship either evolves or dies in that final goodbye. I say all of that to make a point about great recruiting and the few that understand and takes the time to "get you" and what you do. It means everything to someone with experience to allow an agency to represent your abilities as a professional and they get it. They get you. If that doesn't ring bells in the realm of recruiter relationships, then you've haven't paid attention.
cons: I can only speak on the process of vetting so absolutely no concerns at this point.
advice_to_mgmt: Keep growing and hire more talent gurus that take time with there candidates just like Steve.

pros: Riderflex did an incredible job of placing me into a contract employment position with a very large company. They are extremely professional and their care and follow through are second to none. The client company took a very long time to make a decision, but Riderflex hung in there for me through the entire time. Communications are valuable and are always without delay. I would recommend them to anyone.
cons: No Cons, just super great people!
advice_to_mgmt: Keep on with what you are doing !

pros: I love working this job because it allows me to work from home and have a good work life balance. The CEO is also great, I always get feedback on tasks and have room for growth.
cons: Being a start up we sometimes run into basic tactical issues, but with our team it is always solved quickly and efficiently.

pros: I thoroughly enjoy working with the CEO. He provides ongoing feedback and mentoring. Working from home with a flexible schedule makes for a great work-life balance.
cons: Still in a startup phase so there can be some challenges, but they are always quickly addressed.

years_at_company: Riderflex is the standard of how Recruiting should be
pros:
- OUTSTANDING organization within the company
- Extremely good & efficient communication
- Asks the most relevant questions for the open positions
- Follow up is outstanding!
- Best recruiting process I've ever been a part of
cons:
- Absolutely NO cons whatsoever
- They don't waste your time
- They value your background
- They are 150% professional!
advice_to_mgmt: Keep doing everything you're doing...you're hands down the most professional recruiters I've ever been a part of

review_title: Great team run by great people
years_at_company: Great team run by great people
pros: Riderflex is an expanding recruiting company that knows what they are doing. Their approach to their field is revolutionary and their conduct as a company is respectful, fair and generous. I always feel respected, my knowledge is valued and I have been rewarded for it with great opportunities in addition to the pleasure of working with Riderflex.
cons: I wish they had more work for me, but as a designer/developer, that is not a negative reflection on them. I look forward to having more projects with them as they continue to expand.
